person.persName: John Downing (Mason County, Kentucky, tobacco merchant and trader)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, tobacco merchant and trader. Kentucky native. Married to Rebecca Downing. Father of Sarah B. Downing, Mary S. Downing, and Francis M. Downing. Tobacco merchant in Mason County in 1850. Trader in Mason County in 1860. Member of the Board of Trustees of Germantown, Kentucky, in 1864.
